alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Simcoe Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 15 at 2:31PM PST until January 16 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in freezing fog. * WHERE...In Washington, Kittitas Valley, Lower Columbia Basin of Washington and Simcoe Highlands. In Oregon, Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Kittitas Valley; Lower Columbia Basin of Washington; Simcoe Highlands
